quiz.question: Which collective noun describes a group of kangaroos moving together?
Which collective noun names a group of jellyfish moving together in the sea?
Which obscure collective noun is given to a group of owls when they roost silently?
Which common collective noun describes many birds gathered or flying together?
Which collective noun describes a group of whales traveling and surfacing together?
Which collective noun is sometimes used for a group of trout in a stream?
Which collective noun describes a group of seals gathered on rocks or shore?
Which collective noun is used for a group of pelicans flying together?
Which obscure collective noun describes a group of owls engaged in a formal assembly in lore?
Which collective noun is used for geese flying in formation across the sky?
Which collective noun names a group of actors who perform in television or film?
Which collective noun describes a group of goldfish kept together in a pond?
Which basic collective noun describes people working together on a sports field?
Which vocabulary term describes a group of musicians working behind the scenes?
Which specialized collective noun historically names a group of quail together?
